item.name: method
item.description: Type of the method: **constant** - all pairs have the same value **lambdaconst** set in options file. **spheres** - molecules are treated as spheres with radii **radius** given in the segments file and Pekar factor **pekar** set in options file. **dielectric** - with Pekar factor **pekar** set in options file and partial charges and resulting dielectric fields.

item.name: lambda
item.description: Constant value for all pairs used in method **constant**

item.name: pekar
item.description: Pekar factor used for methods **spheres** and **dielectric**

item.name: radius
item.description: Radius of spherical molecule as used in method **spheres**

item.name: cutoff
item.description: Cutoff radius in nm between pair and the exteroir molecule. Can be used in **spheres** and **dielectric**
